main event: A sighting of an unidentified object described as a tear-drop shape, blue-white in color, observed over Denver, Colorado on August 13, 1959.
interesting points: The object was observed entering and exiting the atmosphere at intervals during daylight hours., The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes., The object was seen disappearing after a straight trajectory., Witnesses included civilians in the area., It was speculated to possibly be a meteor or balloon.
